events.name: Virginia Tech Hokies at Pittsburgh Panthers

headlines.description: Jerod Evans shook off a right ankle injury to throw for a career-high 406 yards and two touchdowns and lead No. 25 Virginia Tech to a 39-36 victory over Pittsburgh on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 25 Virginia Tech holds off Pitt in 39-36 win

video.headline: Ford's juggling catch is a record breaker for Virginia Tech

headlines.description: Jordan Johnson ran for a Buffalo-record 282 yards in the Bulls' 41-20 victory over Akron on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Johnson runs for Buffalo-record 282 yards, Bulls beat Akron

video.headline: Buffalo punctuates win with spectacular TD run from Johnson

headlines.description: Dorian Brown had career highs with 212 yards rushing and 29 carries and Ohio beat Toledo 31-26 on Thursday night for the Bobcats' first road victory over the Rockets since 1967.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brown leads Ohio to 31-26 win; 1st win at Toledo since 1967

events.name: Appalachian State Mountaineers at Georgia Southern Eagles

headlines.description: Taylor Lamb passed for 199 yards and ran for 94 yards and two touchdowns to help Appalachian State beat Georgia Southern 34-10 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lamb, Appalachian State beat Georgia Southern 34-10

video.headline: Lamb's 30-yard rushing TD breaks game open for App State

events.name: California Golden Bears at USC Trojans

headlines.description: Sam Darnold threw five touchdowns passes, Ronald Jones rushed for a career-high 223 yards and Southern California downed California 45-24 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Darnold, Jones lead USC over Cal 45-24

video.headline: Darnold makes it five TDs as USC continues to roll
